sentences.sentence: When will the single currency be operable?
sentences.translation: 什么时候实行单一货币？

sentences.sentence: The spare parts kit, necessary to keep the weapons system operable, was also delivered in July.
sentences.translation: 7月份还交付了备用件和保证武器系统可以使用的其他设备。

sentences.sentence: Some of the features of the LEAF, like the Settings for recharging its batteries, will be operable remotely by phone.
sentences.translation: LEAF上的一些特性，如重新充电的设定可通过电话进行远程操作。
